name: rosetta stoneachu
description:
turn based battle game I made to help me learn spanish vocab

also includes some other languages (french, malay, turkish and portuguese)

let me know if there are any errors or other languages you'd like to see (german, italian & korean planned for next release)

NB: It seems the game is crashing when selecting a language. Would anyone with a PD be able to send me a stack trace of the error when plugged into a pc?
